#summary LOST Server Main page.

= Introduction =

LOST Server is the centralized part of the LOST system.

This is based on a [http://www.ethernut.de/en/hardware/enut2/index.html Ethernut 2.1B] board.
[LOST_Server_Hw_Main See hardware description for more details].

= Details =

This server is charged of:
  * Power system management.
  * Alert management (GSM, Email, Buzzer).
  * Motion detector management.
  * Central heater management.
  * Link to NODES.


[http://lebomb-home-system-terminal.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/LOST_Server/Images/Server_Archi.jpg]
